subject: Instant Replay (Sports)
Officiating (Sports)
Baseball
Law and Legislation
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz’s home run helped Boston to a 8-1 win over Toronto a day after the Red Sox had five errors in a 14-5 loss to the Yankees.
